0.text: Bug 26890  [Dialogs] FilteredList - toggle case sensitivity after creation.

1.text: Right now, one can define whether the FilteredList is "case sensitive" or "case insensitive" only at class creation.

2.text: I think one should be able to toggle the behavior after creation.

3.text: Class FilteredList is a public class and will be reused in different contexts -- in one of these context it might be useful to have an accompaning checkbox "Case sensitive" or adjust the case sensitivity in a dynamic way.

4.text: Right now there is no way but to rewrite class FilteredList to be able to support the checkbox ... fIgnoreCase is private and has no getter/setter-method ... so even a hypothetical subclass could not change the behavior.

5.text: see bug 23187 for an example (the descision on that bug has no impact on this feature request)
